text.div:
LinkIdTextCardinalityTypeDescription & Constraints
clinician-reported-baselineQuestionnairehttps://molic-avc.gabriellesantosleandro.com/Questionnaire/ClinicalResponseBaseline#1.0.1
General-Information-ClinicalGeneral information1..1group
Patient-IDWhat is the patient's identification?1..1stringExpressions:
  • Initial Value: %patient.id
FullName-ClinicalWhat is the patient's full name?1..1stringExpressions:
  • Initial Value: %patient.name.first().given.join(' ') + ' ' + %patient.name.first().family
DemographicsDemographic factors1..1group
SexIndicate the sex of the patient at birth:1..1questionValue Set: AdministrativeGender
Expressions:
  • Initial Value: %expandedGender.expansion.contains.where(code=%patient.gender)
YearOfBirthIn what year was the patient born?1..1integerMax Length: 4
Expressions:
  • Initial Value: %patient.birthDate.substring(0,4)
Stroke-Type-ClinicalStroke Type1..1group
StrokeTypeWhat was the type of stroke1..1questionValue Set: ValueSet for stroke type based on ICHOM
StrokeSev-NIHSSPlease provide the severity of the stroke as assessed by the National Institutes of Health Stroke Scale (NIHSS) (from 1 to 42)1..1integerMax Length: 2
Est-StrokeSev-NIHSS-CatPlease categorize the severity of the stroke considering the National Institutes of Health Stroke Scale (NIHSS) classification1..1questionValue Set: ValueSet that categorizes the estimated severity of the stroke using the NIHSS according to the ICHOM standard.
StrokeSev-LocIndique o nível de consciência do paciente aferido na chegada do hospital1..1questionValue Set: ValueSet Categorizing the State of Consciousness according to the ICHOM standard.
SymtdurClassify the duration of time from the onset of stroke symptoms until arrival at the hospital1..1questionValue Set: ValueSet Categorizing the Duration of Stroke Symptoms
Vascular-SystemicVascular and Systemic1..1group
PriorStrokeExclTIAIndicate whether the patient was ever diagnosed with a stroke (excluding transient ischemic attacks)1..1questionValue Set: ValueSet Yes, No and Unknown
PriorTIAIndicate if the patient has previously been diagnosed with a Transient Ischemic Attack1..1questionValue Set: ValueSet Yes, No and Unknown
MyocardialInfarctionIndicate if the patient has been diagnosed with Myocardial Infarction1..1questionValue Set: ValueSet Yes, No and Unknown
IschemicHeartDiseaseIndicate if the patient has been diagnosed with Ischemic Heart Disease1..1questionValue Set: ValueSet Yes, No and Unknown
AtrialFibFlutIndicate if the patient has been diagnosed with Atrial Fibrillation or Flutter1..1questionValue Set: ValueSet Yes, No and Unknown
DiabetesMellitusIndicate if the patient has a documented history of diabetes mellitus (regardless of the duration of the disease or the need for medication)1..1questionValue Set: ValueSet Yes, No and Unknown
HypertensiveDiseaseIndicate if the patient has a documented history of hypertension, diagnosed and treated with medication and/or diet and/or exercise.1..1questionValue Set: ValueSet Yes, No and Unknown
HyperLipIndicate if the patient has been diagnosed with hyperlipidemia1..1questionValue Set: ValueSet Yes, No and Unknown
Treatment-relatedTreatment/Care Related1..1group
DiagnosisIndicate how the diagnosis was made1..1questionValue Set: ValueSet of the Diagnostic Evidence Base
AdmDateIndicate the hospitalar admission date1..1date

Documentation for this format

extension.valueString: Patient information to pre-populate the form with

item.text: General information
What is the patient's identification?
What is the patient's full name?
Demographic factors
Indicate the sex of the patient at birth:
In what year was the patient born?
Stroke Type
What was the type of stroke
Please provide the severity of the stroke as assessed by the National Institutes of Health Stroke Scale (NIHSS) (from 1 to 42)
Please categorize the severity of the stroke considering the National Institutes of Health Stroke Scale (NIHSS) classification
Indique o nível de consciência do paciente aferido na chegada do hospital
Classify the duration of time from the onset of stroke symptoms until arrival at the hospital
Vascular and Systemic
Indicate whether the patient was ever diagnosed with a stroke (excluding transient ischemic attacks)
Indicate if the patient has previously been diagnosed with a Transient Ischemic Attack
Indicate if the patient has been diagnosed with Myocardial Infarction
Indicate if the patient has been diagnosed with Ischemic Heart Disease
Indicate if the patient has been diagnosed with Atrial Fibrillation or Flutter
Indicate if the patient has a documented history of diabetes mellitus (regardless of the duration of the disease or the need for medication)
Indicate if the patient has a documented history of hypertension, diagnosed and treated with medication and/or diet and/or exercise.
Indicate if the patient has been diagnosed with hyperlipidemia
Treatment/Care Related
Indicate how the diagnosis was made
Indicate the hospitalar admission date
